Event.Text:
Kate told everyone to stand back, so we all huddled behind cover while she ripped open a panel, revealing a mess of wires. Kate chuckled to herself confidently, and with the pliers in hand she cut a large red wire.
A blinding white flash later, the bomb had erupted right in Kate's face sending her flying into a wall, while the explosion destroyed all of the supplies in the room. We quickly rushed to her aid, but she was unresponsive.

Choice.Text: Inform the crowd outside what had happened
